items.title: Instagram brings Reels to the big screen, starting with Amazon Fire TV
items.description: By bringing Reels to TVs, Instagram can better compete with YouTube, which largely dominates the TV space.

items.title: Apple TV adds support for Google Cast even as Netflix ditches the feature
items.description: The tech giant's adoption of Google Cast signals its interest in making Apple TV a more competitive streaming service at a time when the market is see...

items.title: Hacking group says it’s extorting Pornhub after stealing users’ viewing data
items.description: The Scattered Lapsus$ Hunters hacking collective stole Pornhub premium users’ data, including email addresses and viewing history.

items.title: India’s Digantara raises $50M for space-based missile defence tech
items.description: With this funding, Digantara has raised $64.5 million in total.

items.title: Databricks raises $4B at $134B valuation as its AI business heats up
items.description: The data intelligence company has just raised more than $4 billion in a Series L funding round at a $134 billion valuation — up 34% from the $100 bill...
